translationtableentry.text: You cannot keep challenging Rome, Vercingetorix. Surrender now, else we shall destroy Gergovia!
translationtableentry.result: Non puoi continuare a sfidare Roma, Vercingetorige. Arrenditi subito, o distruggeremo Gergovia!

translationtableentry.text: Rome has already oppressed Gaul enough, Roman, prepare to die!\n\nAttack men! For Gaul!
